description:
## Problem

bw list defaults to filter.Status='open' (list.go:84-85), which hides in_progress work. An agent resuming a session sees 'here is what is ready' but not 'here is what you were already working on'. The Store.List method reads from status/<status>/ directories so 'open' only matches status/open/, completely excluding status/in_progress/.

## bd alignment

bd list defaults to showing everything except closed. Our equivalent: default to open + in_progress.

## Implementation

### Data model (internal/issue/issue.go)
- Add Statuses []string to Filter struct (takes precedence over Status when set)
- In Store.List: if len(filter.Statuses) > 0 use those; else if filter.Status != '' use that; else all StatusNames()

### CLI (cmd/bw/list.go)
- Change default (line 84-85) from filter.Status = 'open' to filter.Statuses = []string{'open', 'in_progress'}

### Docs (cmd/bw/command.go)
- Update list command description to 'Defaults to open and in-progress issues, limit 10.'

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] bw list with no flags returns both open and in_progress issues
- [ ] bw list --status open returns only open issues (backward compat)
- [ ] bw list --status in_progress returns only in_progress issues
- [ ] bw list --all still works (all statuses, no limit)
- [ ] bw list --deferred still works
- [ ] bw list --json includes both statuses by default
- [ ] bw list --help description mentions 'open and in-progress'

## Test requirements

- Unit test for Store.List with Statuses filter (multiple statuses)
- Unit test for Store.List with single Status filter (backward compat)
- Unit test for list command default behavior returning both statuses
- Existing tests pass (go test ./...)
title: Default bw list to show open and in_progress issues
